channel.title: Guys, please help me! My client is FUCKED!
channel.description:
Guys, this has been unsolved for three days now!! Please can someone help me!!! Ive just added a Jframe to my client, but when i load it up i get this in my run.bat
[code] C:\Documents and Settings\Tweezy\Desktop\BlazeScape Client\BlazeScape>TITLE Blaz eScape
C:\Documents and Settings\Tweezy\Desktop\BlazeScape Client\BlazeScape>java -Xmx5 12m Jframe 0 0 highmem members 0 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at java.applet.Applet.getDocumentBase(Unknown Source) at client.method80(client.java:5684) at client.method6(client.java:6703) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4358) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
Please help? Because my client freezes as soon as i loaded it!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Guys, please help me! My client is FUCKED!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

sarge2050:

If no one is fixing your problem, maybe you should take out the jframe or reload a backup temporarily and work on the problem when you cool down.

Dude, i am cool, im just anoyed because i need this Jframe otherwise the server won’t be as good as it can be!
Now, trust me, it can find the files because i haven’t changed ANY names or changed the locations![br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 08:41:37 am[/size][hr]heres a better picture

It stays like that untill i close it!?

Read full topic
